overview_of_class: This is the first quarter of the Beginning German sequence: a systematic introduction to basic German. All four language skills - speaking, listening comprehension, reading and writing - are stressed to insure that students acquire a basic command of German. Classes are conducted in German, except when explanations of grammar or other material require the use of English. Key feature of this quarter: Individual oral interviews at the end of the quarter.
name: Beginning German
title: WCAS GERMAN 101-1-20 Beginning German
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: PRE-REG only: Reserved for German majors.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the first quarter of the Beginning German sequence: a systematic introduction to basic German. All four language skills - speaking, listening comprehension, reading and writing - are stressed to insure that students acquire a basic command of German. Classes are conducted in German, except when explanations of grammar or other material require the use of English. Key feature of this quarter: Individual oral interviews at the end of the quarter.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: This is a class for beginners with no previous knowledge of German. Students who have had a formal introduction to German must take the placement test before registering for the course.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: This course will prepare students to continue with German 101-2 in winter quarter.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Class participationGroup workLectureListening exercisesSimulation / role-playWriting assignments

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: AttendanceClass participationHomeworkListening exercisesOtherQuizzesIn lieu of a final exam, students will complete an oral interview with their instructor.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Kontakte 8th edition
Textbook ISBN-13: 978-1259307423

Workbook ISBN 978-1-259-69264-2
